name: Penguin Tower Defense (Release Version)
description: Command an army of un-trained penguins to defend your fields and eliminate waves and waves of slimes! This new tower defense game mixes treathening slimes, an army of flyn't birdos and some ironical jokes. The recipe you'll need to acheive fun! In the game's actual development state, it has 18 diferent "Towers" ( the penguins by itself and their deadly machines used to obliterate slimes ), 8 Tracks in 4 different modes, including one "nearly impossible track". Various waves and kinds of slimes that will require great defenses. ( I don't know how to make the OST for the game or had the money to pay a producer. The tracks used for this game are from Himiko Kuchi's Flying Beagle album. That's why this game isn't monetized, but I'll keep up on the updates and bug fixing! So please, if you find any bug that is ruining the game, let us know in the comments! ) an actual footage of the game '0'
